#summary ls command documentation
= ls =

List the contents of the current working directory.

== Synopsis ==

{{{
ls
}}}

=== Default Aliases ===

|| `dir` || `ls` ||

== Description ==

List the contents of the working directory.

[cmd_popd popd] [cmd_source source]
[cmd_pwd pwd]
